001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.tab;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.Button;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import org.openqa.selenium.By;
006
007/**
008 * Represents a specialized tab component that also behaves like a {@link Button}, enabling
009 * clicking actions and selection checks in a UI automation framework. Provides methods
010 * to verify if a tab is selected by text or locator, optionally within a container.
011 *
012 * <p>Classes implementing this interface typically utilize Selenium-based approaches to
013 * locate and interact with tab elements, whether identified by text, a container element,
014 * or direct locators.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public interface Tab extends Button {
019
020   /**
021    * Checks if the tab is selected within the specified container, identified by the tab's text.
022    *
023    * @param container  the container holding the tab elements.
024    * @param buttonText the text of the tab to check.
025    * @return true if the tab is selected, otherwise false.
026    */
027   boolean isSelected(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
028
029   /**
030    * Checks if the tab is selected within the specified container, without specifying the tab text.
031    *
032    * @param container the container holding the tab elements.
033    * @return true if the tab is selected, otherwise false.
034    */
035   boolean isSelected(SmartWebElement container);
036
037   /**
038    * Checks if the tab, identified by text, is selected without referencing a container.
039    *
040    * @param buttonText the text of the tab to check.
041    * @return true if the tab is selected, otherwise false.
042    */
043   boolean isSelected(String buttonText);
044
045   /**
046    * Checks if the tab, identified by a locator, is selected.
047    *
048    * @param buttonLocator the locator referencing the tab.
049    * @return true if the tab is selected, otherwise false.
050    */
051   boolean isSelected(By buttonLocator);
052}
